headline: Is Coterra Energy (CTRA) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After Strong Multi Year Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Coterra Energy's current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone. This article is built to help you assess that value clearly. Coterra's share price sits at US$28.85, with returns of 5.2% over 7 days, 9.6% over 30 days, 8.5% year to date, 7.7% over 1 year, 33.1% over 3 years and 111.7% over 5 years. These figures give you several time frames to think about how the stock has behaved. Recently, investors have also been weighing Coterra against...
